On one hand, sufficient octylamine can stabilize the perovskite surface; on the other hand, enough oleic acid can ensure the control of morphology through the molar ratio of OAI/OAc (OAc = oleic acid). 51 Weidman et al. achieved fully tunable colloidal 2D perovskite L 2[ABX 3]
